list_variables.description: A comma-delimited list of Amazon S3 buckets to be associated with the S3                   authentication credentials.
list_variables.name: buckets
list_variables.required: Conditional Can be specified only if the type                   property is set to "S3".

list_variables.description: A comma-delimited list of URIs to be associated with the basic authentication                   credentials. The authorization applies to the specified URIs and any more specific                   URI. For example, if you specify http://www.example.com, the                   authorization will also apply to http://www.example.com/test.
list_variables.name: uris
list_variables.required: Conditional Can be specified only if the type                   property is set to "basic".

variables.description: Specifies the access key ID for S3 authentication.
variables.name: accessKeyId
variables.required: Conditional Can be specified only if the type                   property is set to "S3".

variables.description: Specifies the password for basic authentication.
variables.name: password
variables.required: Conditional Can be specified only if the type property is set to                      "basic".

variables.description: Specifies the secret key for S3 authentication.
variables.name: secretKey
variables.required: Conditional Can be specified only if the type                   property is set to "S3".

variables.description: Specifies whether the authentication scheme uses a user name and password                   ("basic") or an access key ID and secret key ("S3").
variables.name: type

variables.description: Specifies the user name for basic authentication.
variables.name: username
variables.required: Conditional Can be specified only if the type property is set to                      "basic".

variables.description: Describes the role for role-based authentication.
variables.name: roleName
variables.required: Conditional Can be specified only if the type                   property is set to "S3".
